properties.description:
This workflow fetches Cisco Secure Firewall incidents and conducts automated enrichment to see if additional data can be found about the endpoint that caused the event. The source of the event is searched in Cisco Secure Endpoint and if a matching endpoint is found, a casebook and sighting are created with more details.

Note: This workflow has been updated to support SecureX Token account keys. See the workflow documentation for more information.

Documentation: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0024

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: AMP_Target, Private_CTIA_Target

Steps:
[] Fetch incidents for the past hour
[] For each incident:
[]> Get the incident's relationships
[]> Loop through each relationship:
[]>> Extract the sighting ID and fetch it
[]>> Extract the target IP from the sighting
[]>> Check if we got an IP address:
[]>>> Search the IP in Secure Endpoint
[]>>> If an endpoint was found, create a casebook and more detailed sighting

properties.relative_url: /ctia/incident/search?limit=100&offset=0&sort_by=timestamp&sort_order=asc&query=source:"NGFW Event Service" AND status:"New" AND incident_time.opened:{$activity.definition_activity_01NPSJLBMDN427SWmWRfklh8bf6A71MLEKU.output.result$ TO *}

actions.name: Secure Endpoint - Get Computer by GUID
actions.title: Secure Endpoint - Get Computer by GUID

properties.display_name: Secure Endpoint - Get Computer by GUID
properties.workflow_name: Secure Endpoint - Get Computer by GUID

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Build the casebook description, targets, and observables

properties.display_name: Build the casebook description, targets, and observables
properties.script:
import sys,json

ampComputer = sys.argv[1]
ampComputer = json.loads(ampComputer)

datetime = sys.argv[2]

computerLink = ampComputer['links']['computer']
computerLink = computerLink.replace('api.', 'console.').replace('/v1', '')

casebookDescription = 'Automated enrichment has been completed for the endpoint **[' + ampComputer['hostname'] + '](' + computerLink + ')** related to an NGFW event.' + "\n\n"
casebookDescription = casebookDescription + 'Operating System: ' + ampComputer['operating_system'] + "\n\n"
casebookDescription = casebookDescription + 'Isolation Available: ' + ('Yes' if ampComputer['isolation']['available'] else 'No') + "\n\n Endpoint Isolated: " + ('Yes' if ampComputer['isolation']['status'] == 'isolated' else 'No')

observables = []
observables.append({ 'type': 'hostname', 'value': ampComputer['hostname'] })
observables.append({ 'type': 'amp_computer_guid', 'value': ampComputer['connector_guid'] })

for ip in ampComputer['internal_ips']:
	observables.append({ 'type': 'ip', 'value': ip })

for adapter in ampComputer['network_addresses']:
	if 'mac' in adapter:
		observables.append({ 'type': 'mac_address', 'value': adapter['mac'] })
	if 'ip' in adapter and not { 'type': 'ip', 'value': adapter['ip'] } in observables:
		observables.append({ 'type': 'ip', 'value': adapter['ip'] })

target = {
	'type': 'endpoint',
	'observables': observables,
	'observed_time': {
		'start_time': datetime
	}
}

observables = json.dumps(observables)
target = json.dumps([ target ])
